text.section: Anyone may apply to the Secretary of State to furnish a certificate of existence for an entity.
Subject to any qualification stated in the certificate, a certificate of existence issued by the Secretary of State may be relied upon as conclusive evidence that the entity is in existence.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 80, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 20, effective January 1, 2011.
